scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production yarn run webpack && sam build
scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=development yarn run chokidar "src/**/*.ts" "../frontend/src/common/**/*.ts" --command "yarn run build" --initial
scripts.dynamodb: (sleep 3; aws dynamodb create-table --cli-input-json file://template-local-db.json --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 --output text) & docker run -p 8000:8000 amazon/dynamodb-local
